sentence.Network_en: There was a sudden whir as the airplane started its engines.
sentence.Network_cn: 飞机的发动机起动时,立即发出呼呼的声响.

sentence.Network_en: The house and garden were ablaze with lights, and the whir of electric fans was everywhere.
sentence.Network_cn: 满屋子和满园子的电灯都开亮了, 电风扇荷荷地到处在响.

sentence.Network_en: They made us dizzy with the flap and whir of their wings.
sentence.Network_cn: 呆在地球上吧,你们这些未来的鹰!
